title.narrative: Mato Grosso Fiscal Adjustment and Environmental Sustainability DPL

description.narrative: Program Development Objective of this DPL is to support the State of Mato Grosso to (i) regain fiscal sustainability and (ii) increase institutional capacity for sustainable agriculture, forest conservation and climate change mitigation.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
